metadata.title: CVE-2022-48863 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:mISDN: Fix memory leak in dsp_pipeline_build()dsp_pipeline_build() allocates dup pointer by kstrdup(cfg),but then it updates dup variable by strsep(&dup, "|").As a result when it calls kfree(dup), the dup variable contains NULL.Found by Linux Driver Verification project (linuxtesting.org) with SVACE.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '4.4.0-1105.112').
